data.title: Sports Scholarship
data.meta_description:
Sports Scholarship Academy 

The UL Sport Scholarship Academy for High Performance Athletes is designed to support you a student athlete. We want to help you to balance your academic study and to also excel in your sport while in the University of Limerick. 

The Sports Scholarships academy was launched in 2016 and to date we
data.text:
The Sports Scholarships academy was launched in 2016 and to date we have invested over â‚¬1M in our athletes. In 2016 we started with 32 athletes and this has grown to 120 athletes in the academic year 2023/24. Our Scholarship programme currently spans over 19 sports. The Sport Scholarships are open to all current full time, UL students or those who are applying to come to UL for the first time either through CAO or transferring at Undergraduate or postgraduate level. Applicants must be a member of a national governing body of sport recognised by the Irish Sports Council, in the Sport in which they are applying for a scholarship.

Applications for the 2024 / 25 Academic year are now closed.

(Note: Please be aware that the UL Sports Scholarship programme does not offer a reduced points system, all students must achieve the points required for their chosen course)
